_header: Sit down Robin and rest thee
_description: Advice as if given to Robin Hood — three couplets

NottsULMeLm1.Transcription:
Syt doun Robyn & reste theIn a goode corn contre neste
                    theffor fro thy kynnesmen feste theno eye not thy neyghbur sit next
                    theBe war of the wynd in the westRobyn thus shalt thou fare wythe
                    best
